name: SHANAQ
description:
A free multi-language letter guessing game similar to hangman and wheel of fortune with multiplayer and mod support.

  • Guess the phrase letter by letter!
  • Many categories included by default such as Animals, Countries, and Anime Shows!
  • Supports many languages such as Arabic, Mandarin, Russian, Japanese, and many more!
  • Easily create and download mods using mod.io!
  • Supports local multiplayer with up to 8 players!
  • Supoorts multiple controller!

This game was made by a solo developer in a month and a half so please forgive any mistakes or shortcomings.

Most translations were done using google translate so please forgive any mistakes, and you are welcome to create your own words with more accuracy!

Thank you for playing and please share and rate!
